Welcome

Hi,

My name is Omphalus Harkie Kua but all my friends call me Ompa. I come from the Simbu Province located in the Highlands region of Papua New Guinea. I arrived in New Zealand in 1999 on an academic scholarship. I have since learned to appreciate the struggles of life here in N.Z. The most endearing but precious struggle I have had to endure since 2008 was becoming a single father while persuing my dream of becoming an art director.

Eleven years later today and I am still a single-dad to my only son and I am happy that I have come this far with my acheivements and shared life experiences with my son. It was my persistance in persuing my dream that I discovered my appreciation for graphic design and web development.
My son is now 14 years old and as for me well, I am now ready to secure a positive career in the Creative industry to give my son and I a good future. This is my first online portfolio of work.

I thank you for visiting and do contact me if you have any questions regarding anything.

ABOUT

About this website

Hello,

Welcome to my portfolio website. My name is Omphalus Harkie Kua but you can call me Ompa. I am a young minded Web and Graphic Designer and Frontend Web-Developer. At this point, I wish to start a professional career through design and coding to earn my experience.

I received my Bachelor of Creative Technology with a major in Digital Media at the end of 2014. I then went on to learn coding and became a frontend web-Developer in 2016. My goal is to get some solid years of experience in this creative industry where design and coding can become one. Therefore, I hope that this portfolio web site can help me reach my goal.

As an artist and human, I thank you for visiting and I hope you will or have already had a pleasent experience through this website.

This website was coded without using any Frame-works to allow me to have a better understanding of the relationships between Html, Css and javascript plus Jquery. Therefore once it is complete, I will recode the same design but this time through one of the major framewo-works of either Bootstrap, Foundation and or Wordpress and if time persists, then I shall attempt all three. I have used gulp to precompile and minify the sass, script.js and images files. I have also run autoprefixer to handle the Flex-box items. I have tried to make the site Responsive across mobile, tablet and desktop. The theme tor this website was based off the colors of the flag for my country and province together.

Core-skills

I have a good understanding of the Adobe Creative suite. I am great with Photoshop and Illustrator and I enjoy Premier Pro for editing film and I like doing small motion graphics with After-effects. I recently, over the last couple of years have taken up coding for websites, including HTML5, javascript/jquery, css/sass and I am familiar the bootstrap and foundation frameworks as well as WordPress for backened projects. I enjoy making music/beats and writing songs. I also like editing for film or music videos. I guess I think of myself as a multimedia artist.

I wish to own a creative digital studio in the future but as for now, I am happy to learn and expand on my skills and gain real experience in the industry. Below are a few links of disciplines containing each my thoughts and ideas of them respectively.

Wagai-weh
